name: form-populator
description: Lightweight vanilla JS utility to instantly sync API data (or any object) into forms and DOM elements. One call populates inputs, checkboxes, radios, selects (native/TomSelect/Selectize/Chosen/AutoNumeric), content, lists, and attributes. Extract values back just as easily. Zero dependencies, no frameworks, full control.

scripts.test: echo "Open tests/FormPopulator_tests.html in your brow  ser to run QUnit tests" && exit 0

author: Raul Jose Santos
